properties.body:
NORTH ATLANTIC.
CANARY ISLANDS TO BAHAMAS.
EIGHT METER S/V SHEARWATER ISLE, RED HULL, ONE PERSON
ON BOARD, OVERDUE LAS PALMAS (28-09N 015-25W)
TO BAHAMAS. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC LAS PALMAS, PHONE: 349 2846 7757,
E-MAIL: LASPALMAS@SASEMAR.ES.
